text:
@realDonaldTrump Dear Pres

Do you feel guilty reading
Covid19 total DEATH to today 

Japan < 900
S.Korea  < 300
China  < 5000
US > 100000 + > 1.7 million infected

You are destroying free market/competition n blackmailing the world

U r seen a Dictator no democracy listen to no one but yourself
